item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1165; 03:42PM; 410 E Manitoba St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3E7owJA; Playa del Rey; KNOCKDOWN: 26 firefighters extinguished the fire in 19 minutes. Crews contained the fire to the room of origin in the structure. The male patient (age unknown) with burn injuries (currently being assessed on scene by firefighter/paramedics) may have been involved in the cause of the fire and LAFD Arson section was notified and are responding for the investigation. No further details.; FS 67; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC4 E205 E5 E51 E67 EM4 RA33 RA5 RA69 T5; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1165; 03:23PM; 410 E Manitoba St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3E7owJA; Playa del Rey; One story, single family dwelling with fire showing. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. There are initial reports of one patient with possible burn injuries.; FS 67; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC4 E205 E5 E67 RA69 T5; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1049; 02:35PM; 6641 N Whitsett Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3I0AF3Q; Valley Glen; KNOCKDOWN: 28 firefighters extinguished the fire in 17 minutes with no injuries reported. The fire extended into the common attic space and was burning east from the end unit towards Whitsett. Firefighters located and stopped the fire from extending into the adjoined units. Whitsett Ave is closed to traffic between Archwood St and Kittridge St - drivers are asked to avoid the area. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E102 E260 E60 E89 RA89 T60 T89; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1049; 02:18PM; 6641 N Whitsett Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3I0AF3Q; Valley Glen; A row of bungalows with fire in the end unit. Firefighters are in the offensive mode with no other buildings exposed.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E102 E260 E60 E89 RA89 T60 T89; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

title.a: KNOCKDOWN Major Emergency Structure Fire 02/13/2023 INC#0085

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Major Emergency Structure Fire; INC#0085; 02:30AM; 255 S Reno St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3MMV5P7; #Westlake; Over 150 firefighters responded to the blaze, which began in a vacant two-story home, and spread to apartment buildings on either side (addresses 245 and 259 S Reno St). It took firefighters 73 minutes to extinguish the flames in all three structures. While, thankfully, only one patient was treated for minor smoke inhalation (no transport), residents from approximately 56 units will be displaced. Our partners at the American Red Cross will be assisting these families during this time. No other injuries. The cause of the fire is under investigation. ; FS 6; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 13; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC18 BC2 BC5 CM20 CM21 CM22 E10 E11 E13 E203 E209 E210 E211 E215 E220 E221 E226 E229 E233 E235 E27 E288 E29 E4 E52 E56 E6 E89 EA1 EM1 EM11 EM14 HR3 PI3 RA13 RA20 RA29 RA3 RA35 RA52 RA6 RA803 RA806 RA811 SQ21 T10 T11 T15 T20 T21 T26 T29 T3 T33 T35 T88 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 14 15 16; Nicholas Prange

Major Emergency Structure Fire; INC#0085; 01:17AM; 245 S Reno St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3MMV5P7; #Westlake; Two-story vacant home engulfed in flames, extending to two neighboring apartment buildings (2-story garden style, and a 2-story center hallway). ; FS 6; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 13; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC18 BC2 BC5 CM20 CM22 E10 E11 E13 E203 E210 E211 E215 E220 E221 E229 E235 E27 E29 E4 E52 E56 E6 EA1 EM1 EM11 EM14 HR3 RA13 RA20 RA3 RA35 RA6 RA803 RA806 RA811 SQ21 T10 T11 T15 T20 T21 T29 T3 T35 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 14 15; Nicholas Prange

Hiker Rescue; INC#0432; 08:11AM; 136 Griffith Park; MAP: https://bit.ly/3qE7dHP; #GriffithPark; Firefighters located a 19-year-old female with a suspected leg fracture on or near a trail in the Griffith Park area. LAFD Air Operations performed a hoist operation and transported her to an area hospital by air. Nothing further.; FS 35; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E235 E56 H2 H3 H5 HA2 HA3 HA5 RA35 RA56 RA835 RH114 T35; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Traffic Collision; INC#1265; 06:25PM; 5900 N Topanga Canyon Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3YHcNJA; #WoodlandHills; A significant collision between three vehicles, which deployed air bags in all three, resulted in 6 patients being transported to the hospital (1 in critical condition, 1 in moderate condition, and 4 in fair condition). Unknown age/gender/affiliation/circumstances. LAPD Inc #3123. Nothing further.; FS 84; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E84 EM14 EM15 EM17 RA105 RA106 RA72 RA84 RA878 RA891; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

title.a: KNOCKDOWN Greater Alarm Structure Fire 02/11/2023 INC#1153

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#1153; 05:53PM; 1068 S San Pedro St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3YH9su2; #DowntownLA; **Corrected Address** The first 66 LAFD firefighters to arrive found a 400' x 40' structure (approximately 16,000 sq-ft) with fire inside, the majority of which was isolated to a mezzanine. It took 24 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 9; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC5 CM20 CM22 E10 E17 E2 E202 E203 E210 E211 E215 E220 E26 E4 E5 E9 EA1 EA2 EM1 EM11 EM13 EM14 HR3 RA10 RA209 RA803 RA809 RA810 RA9 SQ21 T10 T11 T15 T2 T20 T3 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Nicholas Prange
